coreAttributes.authorTag: A logo on the lid reveals that the pudding was made by MintyChip Sweets.
coreAttributes.name: Honey Pudding
coreAttributes.description: A brown plastic cup containing honey and vanilla pudding. An image on the lid shows a bee-girl smiling in approval while a small amount of vanilla pudding drips from her lips.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the lid off of the brown plastic cup and [npc.verb(unwrap)] the attached spoon. After taking a sniff of the sweet smelling dessert, [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] digging in, savouring eash spoonfull. In a matter of moments, [npc.she] has devoured the entire cup.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the lid off of the brown plastic cup and [npc.verb(unwrap)] the attached spoon before holding it out to [npc2.name]. After taking a sniff of the sweet smelling dessert, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(start)] digging in, savouring eash spoonfull. In a matter of moments, [npc2.she] has devoured the entire cup.
